text: Have Gun – Will Travel was a western television series that aired on CBS. It aired from September 14, 1957 to April 20, 1963 for six seasons and 225 episodes. It stars Richard Boone, Kam Tong, Joanne Linville. ==Other websites== * Category:American drama television series Category:Western (genre) television series Category:CBS network shows Category:1950s television series Category:1957 television series debuts Category:1963 television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: Have Gun – Will Travel
